mapper.insert: /* ShopHelpDeskDao.insertQNA */ INSERT INTO CONTACT_BOARD( BBS_ID ,BBS_TP ,RELATE_CD ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,WRITER ,PHONE ,CREATE_DT ,CREATE_ID ) VALUES ( #bbsId# ,#bbsTp# ,#relateCd# ,#title# ,#bbsCon# ,IFNULL(#usrNm#, #bbsNm#) ,IFNULL(#mobile#, #bbsPhone#) ,NOW() ,#usrId# )
mapper.select: /* ShopHelpDeskDao.getBbsList */ SELECT BBS_ID ,BBS_TP ,ARTICLE_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,( SELECT CONCAT(FILE_STRE_COURS,FILE_STRE_NM) FROM ATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = ARTICLE_ID AND ATCH_TP = #bbsId# AND USE_AT = 'Y' LIMIT 0,1 ) AS DETAIL_IMG ,CREATE_DT FROM BOARD WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC

/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getQnaList */ SELECT B.BBS_ID ,C.DTL_CD_NM ,B.CONTENT ,B.CREATE_DT ,B.ANSWER ,B.ANSWER_DT FROM CONTACT_BOARD B, CMM_CODE_DTL C WHERE B.CREATE_ID = #usrId# AND B.BBS_ID = C.DTL_CD AND C.CL_CD = '1007' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.BBS_ID NOT IN ('MNG','ORD') ORDER BY B.ARTICLE_ID DESC

/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getPromoList */ SELECT P.PROMO_ID , P.ARTICLE_ID , P.TITLE , CONCAT(A.FILE_STRE_COURS, A.FILE_STRE_NM) AS DETAIL_IMG, P.CREATE_DT FROM BOARD B, PROMO_BOARD P, ATCH_FILE A WHERE B.BBS_ID = 'PRM' AND B.ARTICLE_ID = P.ARTICLE_ID AND B.ARTICLE_ID = A.ATCH_FILE_NO AND A.ATCH_TP = 'PRM' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USE_AT = 'Y' AND B.BBS_STRT_DT <= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') AND B.BBS_END_DT >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d')
/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getBbsCnt */ SELECT BBS_TP ,COUNT(1) AS BBS_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY BBS_TP

/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getPromoInfo */ SELECT P.ARTICLE_ID AS sArtCd ,P.PROMO_ID AS sPrmId ,P.PROMO_TP AS sPrmTp ,P.TITLE as sTitle ,P.BGCOLOR AS sBgCr ,P.URL AS sUrl ,P.WIDTH AS sWidth ,P.HEIGHT AS sHeight ,P.USE_YN AS sUseYN ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(FILE_STRE_COURS,FILE_STRE_NM) SEPARATOR '|') FROM ATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = P.PROMO_ID AND ATCH_TP = 'DTL' AND USE_AT = 'Y' )AS sImg FROM PROMO_BOARD AS P WHERE P.PROMO_ID = #pCode#

/*ShopHelpDeskDao.getPromoPrdt*/ SELECT A.PROMO_ID AS PROMO_ID, A.ARTICLE_ID AS ARTICLE_ID, A.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD, A.PRDT_DTL_CD AS PRDT_DTL_CD, B.PRDT_NM AS PRDT_NM, B.MAKR_NM AS MAKR_NM, B.PRDT_IMG AS PRDT_IMG, C.STNDRD AS STNDRD, C.SEL_PRICE AS SEL_PRICE, D.CATEG_CD AS CATEG_CD, D.CATEG_NM AS CATEG_NM FROM PROMO_PRDUCT A, PRDT_MST B, PRDT_DTL C, CATEG_INFO D WHERE A.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_CD = C.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_DTL_CD = C.PRDT_DTL_CD AND A.CATEG_CD = D.CATEG_CD AND A.PROMO_ID = #pCode# ORDER BY D.CATEG_NM , B.PRDT_CD, C.PRDT_DTL_CD

/*ShopHelpDeskDao.getCategPromoPrdt*/ SELECT A.PROMO_ID AS PROMO_ID, A.ARTICLE_ID AS ARTICLE_ID, A.PRDT_CD AS PRDT_CD, A.PRDT_DTL_CD AS PRDT_DTL_CD, B.PRDT_NM AS PRDT_NM, B.MAKR_NM AS MAKR_NM, B.PRDT_IMG AS PRDT_IMG, C.STNDRD AS STNDRD, C.SEL_PRICE AS SEL_PRICE, D.CATEG_CD AS CATEG_CD, D.CATEG_NM AS CATEG_NM FROM PROMO_PRDUCT A, PRDT_MST B, PRDT_DTL C, CATEG_INFO D WHERE A.PRDT_CD = B.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_CD = C.PRDT_CD AND A.PRDT_DTL_CD = C.PRDT_DTL_CD AND A.CATEG_CD = D.CATEG_CD AND A.PROMO_ID = #pCode# ORDER BY D.CATEG_NM , B.PRDT_CD, C.PRDT_DTL_CD

/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getEstimateList */ SELECT M.EST_ID ,M.MOBILE ,M.USR_PW ,M.REQ_DT ,M.STTUS ,C.DTL_CD_NM AS STTUS_TXT ,M.CHAR_NM ,A.PRDT_NM ,IF(COUNT(A.PRDT_DTL_CD) <= 1 ,'' , CONCAT(' 외',(COUNT(A.PRDT_DTL_CD)-1),'건')) AS CNT FROM CMM_CODE_DTL C, ESTIMATE_MST M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT P.EST_ID ,P.PRDT_DTL_CD ,PM.PRDT_NM FROM ESTIMATE_PRDT P, PRDT_MST PM WHERE P.PRDT_CD = PM.PRDT_CD AND P.USE_YN = 'Y' )A ON M.EST_ID = A.EST_ID WHERE M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#) AND C.CL_CD = '1020' AND M.STTUS = C.DTL_CD GROUP BY M.EST_ID

/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getEstimateInfo */ SELECT M.EST_ID ,M.MOBILE ,M.USR_PW ,M.CHAR_NM ,M.CHAR_EMAIL ,M.CMP_NM ,M.RPRSNTV_NM ,M.BIZCND ,M.INDUTY ,M.TEL_NO ,M.FAX_NO ,M.ADRESS ,M.REQ_DT ,M.REQ_RMK ,M.REC_RMK ,M.CNT ,M.STTUS ,M.CREATE_DT FROM ESTIMATE_MST M WHERE M.EST_ID = #estId# AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#)
mapper.insert:
SELECT IF(#estId# = '', IFNULL(MAX(EST_ID), 10000000) + 1, #estId#) AS estId FROM ESTIMATE_MST
/* ShopHelpDeskDao.setEestimateMst */ INSERT INTO ESTIMATE_MST( EST_ID ,MOBILE ,USR_PW ,CHAR_NM ,CHAR_EMAIL ,CMP_NM ,RPRSNTV_NM ,BIZCND ,INDUTY ,TEL_NO ,FAX_NO ,ADRESS ,REQ_RMK ,CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #estId# ,#mobileNo# ,SHA1(#usrPw#) ,#usrNm# ,#email# ,#cmpNm# ,#prsNm# ,#bizcnd# ,#induty# ,#telNum# ,#faxNum# ,#address# ,#reqRmk# ,NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE CHAR_NM = #usrNm# ,CHAR_EMAIL = #email# ,CMP_NM = #cmpNm# ,RPRSNTV_NM = #prsNm# ,BIZCND = #bizcnd# ,INDUTY = #induty# ,TEL_NO = #telNum# ,FAX_NO = #faxNum# ,ADRESS = #address# ,REQ_RMK = #reqRmk# ,UPDATE_DT = NOW()

/*ShopHelpDeskDao.setEestimatePrdt*/ INSERT INTO ESTIMATE_PRDT ( EST_ID ,PRDT_DTL_CD ,PRDT_CD ,PRICE ,UNIT ,TOT_PRICE ,CREATE_DT ) SELECT #estId# , D.PRDT_DTL_CD , D.PRDT_CD , D.SEL_PRICE , D.OUT_UNIT , D.SEL_PRICE , NOW() FROM PRDT_DTL D WHERE D.PRDT_CD = #PRDT_CD# AND D.PRDT_DTL_CD = #PRDT_DTL_CD# AND D.PRDT_DTL_CD NOT IN ( SELECT PRDT_DTL_CD FROM ESTIMATE_PRDT WHERE EST_ID = #estId# )
mapper.select: /* ShopHelpDeskDao.getEstimatePrdt */ SELECT M.EST_ID ,P.PRDT_DTL_CD ,P.PRICE ,P.QY ,P.UNIT ,P.TOT_PRICE ,P.RMK ,PM.PRDT_NM ,PM.MAKR_NM ,PD.STNDRD ,PD.MODEL_NM ,PM.PRDT_IMG ,PD.OUT_AMT ,PD.OUT_UNIT FROM ESTIMATE_MST M, ESTIMATE_PRDT P, PRDT_MST PM, PRDT_DTL PD WHERE M.EST_ID = #estId# AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#) AND M.EST_ID = P.EST_ID AND P.PRDT_CD = PM.PRDT_CD AND P.PRDT_CD = PD.PRDT_CD AND P.PRDT_DTL_CD = PD.PRDT_DTL_CD
mapper.delete:
/*ShopHelpDeskDao.delEstPrdt*/ DELETE FROM ESTIMATE_PRDT WHERE EST_ID IN ( SELECT M.EST_ID FROM ESTIMATE_MST M WHERE M.EST_ID = #estId# AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#) )

mapper.update: /*ShopHelpDeskDao.uptEstPrdt*/ UPDATE ESTIMATE_PRDT SET QY = #prdtQy# ,TOT_PRICE = (#prdtQy# * PRICE) ,RMK = #prdtRmk# WHERE EST_ID IN ( SELECT M.EST_ID FROM ESTIMATE_MST M WHERE M.EST_ID = #estId# AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#) ) AND PRDT_DTL_CD = #prdtDtl#

/*ShopHelpDeskDao.reqEst*/ UPDATE ESTIMATE_MST SET CNT = #cnt# ,REQ_DT = NOW() ,UPDATE_DT = NOW() ,STTUS = '1' ,SUM_P = ( SELECT SUM(TOT_PRICE) FROM ESTIMATE_PRDT WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND EST_ID = #estId# ) WHERE EST_ID = #estId# AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#)
mapper.select: /* ShopHelpDeskDao.getEstDocInfo */ SELECT M.EST_ID ,M.MOBILE ,M.USR_PW ,M.CHAR_NM ,M.CHAR_EMAIL ,M.CMP_NM ,M.RPRSNTV_NM ,M.BIZCND ,M.INDUTY ,M.TEL_NO ,M.FAX_NO ,M.ADRESS ,M.REQ_DT ,M.REQ_RMK ,M.CNT ,M.STTUS ,M.REC_DT ,M.CONF_DT ,M.TOT_P ,M.TAX_P ,M.SUM_P ,M.D_FEE ,M.DISC ,M.EST_P ,M.REC_RMK ,U.USR_NM FROM ESTIMATE_MST M, USER_INFO U WHERE M.EST_ID = #estId# AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#) AND M.CONF_ID = U.USR_ID

/* ShopHelpDeskDao.getEstDocPrdt */ SELECT M.EST_ID ,P.PRDT_DTL_CD ,P.QY ,P.UNIT ,P.PRICE ,P.TOT_PRICE ,ROUND(P.PRICE/1.1) AS PRICE_9 ,ROUND(P.TOT_PRICE/1.1) AS TOT_PRICE_9 ,P.PERIOD ,P.RMK ,P.REC_RMK ,PM.PRDT_NM ,PM.MAKR_NM ,PD.STNDRD ,PD.MODEL_NM ,PM.PRDT_IMG ,PD.OUT_AMT ,PD.OUT_UNIT FROM ESTIMATE_MST M, ESTIMATE_PRDT P, PRDT_MST PM, PRDT_DTL PD WHERE M.EST_ID = #estId# AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND M.MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND M.USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#) AND M.EST_ID = P.EST_ID AND P.PRDT_CD = PM.PRDT_CD AND P.PRDT_CD = PD.PRDT_CD AND P.PRDT_DTL_CD = PD.PRDT_DTL_CD
mapper.update: /*ShopHelpDeskDao.canEst*/ UPDATE ESTIMATE_MST SET STTUS = '8' ,UPDATE_DT = NOW() WHERE EST_ID = #estId# AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND MOBILE = #mobileNo# AND USR_PW = SHA1(#usrPw#)
mapper.select: /* ShopHelpDeskDao.getPopList */ SELECT BBS_ID ,BBS_TP ,ARTICLE_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,( SELECT CONCAT(FILE_STRE_COURS,FILE_STRE_NM) FROM ATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_FILE_NO = ARTICLE_ID AND ATCH_TP = #bbsId# AND USE_AT = 'Y' LIMIT 0,1 ) AS DETAIL_IMG ,CREATE_DT FROM BOARD WHERE BBS_ID = #bbsId# AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DATE(NOW()) BETWEEN DATE(BBS_STRT_DT) AND DATE(BBS_END_DT) ORDER BY ARTICLE_ID DESC
